statements: UPDATE language_models SET model_name='GPT-3', embedding='model_blob_1' WHERE model_id=1;
UPDATE language_models SET embedding='model_blob_2', model_name='BERT' WHERE model_id=2;
UPDATE language_models SET model_name = 'GPT-3', embedding = 'updated_embedding' WHERE model_id = 1;
UPDATE language_models SET embedding = 'new_embedding', model_name = 'BERT' WHERE model_id = 2;
UPDATE LanguageModels SET model_name='BERT', model_size=500 WHERE id='4482c77e-133f-4314-88d3-1d4c0097e5c4';
UPDATE WordEmbeddings SET vector_length=300, word='apple' WHERE id='96e32d66-5dcf-4c3e-92d5-48cb9b484694';
UPDATE LanguageModels SET model_size = 1000 WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE WordEmbeddings SET embedding = decode('FF00AA', 'hex') WHERE word = 'example';
UPDATE LanguageModels SET model_name = 'GPT-3', model_description = 'Natural language processing model' WHERE model_id = 1;
UPDATE SimilarityCalculations SET similarity_score = 0.95 WHERE calculation_id = 3;
UPDATE LanguageModels SET model_name = 'BERT', model_description = 'Bidirectional Encoder Representations from Transformers' WHERE model_id = 1;
UPDATE SimilarityCalculations SET similarity_score = 0.95 WHERE model_id = 2 AND word_id = 5;
UPDATE language_models SET model_name = 'Updated Model 1' WHERE model_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE similarity_scores SET similarity_score = 0.75 WHERE model_id = '87654321-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND word_1 = 'happy' AND word_2 = 'joyful';
UPDATE language_models SET model_description = 'Updated model description' WHERE model_id = 'a1b2c3';
UPDATE similarity_scores SET similarity_score = 0.95, word_2 = 'updated_word' WHERE model_id = 'xyz123' AND word_1 = 'apple';
UPDATE language_models SET model_description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE word_embeddings SET embedding = ARRAY[1.2, 3.4, 5.6] WHERE word = 'example';
UPDATE language_models SET model_description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE word_embeddings SET embedding = '{0.5, 0.8, 0.3}' WHERE word = 'example';
